intro_info_phase.title: Introduction phase
intro_info_phase.content: Welcome to the KYPO platform. We've prepared training composed of multiple phases whose assignments will be adjusted according to your knowledge and progress in the training. In the next phase, the questionnaire is provided to you to rate your knowledge in various areas. Your answers might have an impact on the difficulty of the assignments. So be careful and answer truthfully.

get_access_phase.title: Get Access
get_access_phase.content: For accessing KYPO virtual machines using your local command-line tool, click on `Get SSH access` button to download ZIP file and then follow the instructions in the [documentation](https://docs.crp.kypo.muni.cz/user-guide-advanced/sandboxes/sandbox-access/#user-access). When you are ready to advance to the next phase, submit the answer provided by the organizer."
get_access_phase.solution: Proceed to the next phase by typing "start-training" to the answer input field and click the submit button.
